Ride Friend
  • Home

About Ride Friend

This work in progress is a car pooling application. A brain child of three friends, we aim to connect drivers and riders who have similar routine commutes. This is application will be deployed for public use later in 2021!

View Demonstration!

Demonstration

Learnings

This project is special to me as it aims to address an issue faced by many. Working on this project reinforced my belief that technology has the potential to improve thousands of lives and also the importance of working on projects that you truly believe in. Working as a part of a team also taught me to communicate and discuss ideas with my team members so that we can work together efficiently.

From a technology standpoint, this project taught me the importance of a sound database structure and state management as we iterated over many different approaches. Working with algorithms to connect the app's users or setting up live notifications are two of the many challenges and problems I got to work on. And the process of facing and overcoming each hurdle has truly been a rewarding one, as I saw the app come to life one step at a time.
